channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bitcoin Milestone Signals Shift to Recognized Asset, Kraken Says
item.description: Bitcoin breaching the $100,000 mark represents a psychological barrier that signals its transition from a fringe technology to a recognized asset, Kra...

item.title: Okta shares pop 18% on earnings beat, strong guidance
item.description: Okta shares soared Tuesday after the company reported strong third-quarter results.

item.title: Bitcoin Hits $100,000, Lifted by Hopes of a Crypto-Friendly Washington
item.description: The world’s largest digital currency has staged an extraordinary rally since Election Day. Some market veterans see irony in crypto’s embrace of polit...

item.title: Oil Edges Higher, Markets Eye OPEC+ Meeting
item.description: Oil edged higher in the Asian session, trading in a tight range.

item.title: Foot Locker shares tumble as it issues gloomy holiday outlook, sees 'softness' at Nike
item.description: Foot Locker fell short of Wall Street expectations and cut its guidance after sales declined more than expected.

item.title: Shares of American Eagle plunge 13% as company issues weak holiday guidance
item.description: American Eagle issued weak holiday guidance after reporting its third sales miss in a row.

item.title: Salesforce shares rise after earnings beat on revenue, fourth-quarter guidance
item.description: Salesforce reported its fiscal third-quarter earnings on Tuesday and posted strong fourth-quarter guidance.

item.title: New Zealand Shares Close Flat Despite Large-Cap Losses

item.title: Salesforce surges on revenue beat, AI growth prospects – here's our new price target for the stock
item.description: Salesforce made clear that Agentfoce, its new AI offering, can kickstart revenue growth in the quarters ahead.
